verses.verse: And it came<WH1961> to pass in the eleventh<WH6240> year,<WH8141> in the first<WH259> day of the month,<WH2320> that the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> to me, saying,<WH559>

Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> because<WH3282> that Tyrus<WH6865> has said<WH559> against<WH5921> Jerusalem,<WH3389> Aha,<WH253> she is broken<WH7665> that was the gates<WH1817> of the people:<WH5971> she is turned<WH5437> to me: I shall be replenished,<WH4390> now she is laid waste:<WH2717>

Therefore<WH3651> thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> Behold,<WH2005> I am against<WH5921> you, O Tyrus,<WH6865> and will cause many<WH7227> nations<WH1471> to come<WH5927> up against<WH5921> you, as the sea<WH3220> causes his waves<WH1530> to come<WH5927> up.

And they shall destroy<WH7843> the walls<WH2346> of Tyrus,<WH6865> and break<WH2040> down<WH2040> her towers:<WH4026> I will also scrape<WH5500> her dust<WH6083> from her, and make<WH5414> her like the top<WH6706> of a rock.<WH5553>

It shall be a place for the spreading<WH4894> of nets<WH2764> in the middle<WH8432> of the sea:<WH3220> for I have spoken<WH1696> it, said<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD:<WH3069> and it shall become<WH1961> a spoil<WH957> to the nations.<WH1471>
And her daughters<WH1323> which<WH834> are in the field<WH7704> shall be slain<WH2026> by the sword;<WH2719> and they shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD.<WH3068>

For thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> Behold,<WH2005> I will bring<WH935> on Tyrus<WH6865> Nebuchadrezzar<WH5019> king<WH4428> of Babylon,<WH894> a king<WH4428> of kings,<WH4428> from the north,<WH6828> with horses,<WH5483> and with chariots,<WH7393> and with horsemen,<WH6571> and companies,<WH6951> and much<WH7227> people.<WH5971>

He shall slay<WH4191> with the sword<WH2719> your daughters<WH1323> in the field:<WH7704> and he shall make<WH5414> a fort<WH1785> against<WH5921> you, and cast<WH8210> a mount<WH5550> against<WH5921> you, and lift<WH6965> up the buckler<WH6793> against<WH5921> you.
And he shall set<WH5414> engines<WH4239> of war<WH6904> against your walls,<WH2346> and with his axes<WH2719> he shall break<WH5422> down<WH5422> your towers.<WH4026>

By reason of the abundance<WH8229> of his horses<WH5483> their dust<WH80> shall cover<WH3680> you: your walls<WH2346> shall shake<WH7493> at the noise<WH6963> of the horsemen,<WH6571> and of the wheels,<WH1534> and of the chariots,<WH7393> when he shall enter<WH935> into your gates,<WH8179> as men enter<WH935> into a city<WH5892> wherein is made a breach.<WH1234>

With the hoofs<WH6541> of his horses<WH5483> shall he tread<WH7429> down all<WH3605> your streets:<WH2351> he shall slay<WH4191> your people<WH5971> by the sword,<WH2719> and your strong<WH5797> garrisons<WH4676> shall go<WH3381> down<WH3381> to the ground.<WH776>

And they shall make<WH5414> a spoil<WH7997> of your riches,<WH2428> and make a prey<WH962> of your merchandise:<WH7404> and they shall break<WH2040> down<WH2040> your walls,<WH2346> and destroy<WH5422> your pleasant<WH2532> houses:<WH1004> and they shall lay<WH7760> your stones<WH68> and your timber<WH6086> and your dust<WH6083> in the middle<WH8432> of the water.<WH4325>
And I will cause the noise<WH1995> of your songs<WH7892> to cease;<WH7673> and the sound<WH6963> of your harps<WH3658> shall be no<WH3808> more<WH5750> heard.<WH8085>

And I will make you like the top<WH6706> of a rock:<WH5553> you shall be a place to spread<WH4894> nets<WH2764> on; you shall be built<WH1129> no<WH3808> more:<WH5750> for I the LORD<WH3068> have spoken<WH1696> it, said<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD.<WH3069>

Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069> to Tyrus;<WH6865> Shall not the isles<WH339> shake<WH7493> at the sound<WH6963> of your fall,<WH4658> when the wounded<WH2491> cry,<WH602> when the slaughter<WH2027> is made in the middle<WH8432> of you?

Then all<WH3605> the princes<WH5387> of the sea<WH3220> shall come<WH3381> down<WH3381> from their thrones,<WH3678> and lay<WH5493> away<WH5493> their robes,<WH4598> and put<WH6584> off their broidered<WH7553> garments:<WH899> they shall clothe<WH3847> themselves with trembling;<WH2731> they shall sit<WH3427> on the ground,<WH776> and shall tremble<WH2729> at every moment,<WH7281> and be astonished<WH8074> at you.

And they shall take<WH5375> up a lamentation<WH7015> for you, and say<WH559> to you, How<WH349> are you destroyed,<WH6> that were inhabited<WH3427> of seafaring<WH3220> men, the renowned<WH1984> city,<WH5892> which<WH834> were strong<WH2389> in the sea,<WH3220> she and her inhabitants,<WH3427> which<WH834> cause<WH5414> their terror<WH2851> to be on all<WH3605> that haunt<WH3427> it!
Now<WH6258> shall the isles<WH339> tremble<WH2729> in the day<WH3117> of your fall;<WH4658> yes, the isles<WH339> that are in the sea<WH3220> shall be troubled<WH926> at your departure.<WH3318>

For thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> When I shall make<WH5414> you a desolate<WH2717> city,<WH5892> like the cities<WH5892> that are not inhabited;<WH3427> when I shall bring<WH5927> up the deep<WH8415> on you, and great<WH7227> waters<WH4325> shall cover<WH3680> you;

When I shall bring<WH3381> you down<WH3381> with them that descend<WH3381> into the pit,<WH953> with the people<WH5971> of old<WH5769> time, and shall set<WH3427> you in the low<WH8482> parts of the earth,<WH776> in places desolate<WH2723> of old,<WH5769> with them that go<WH3381> down<WH3381> to the pit,<WH953> that you be not inhabited;<WH3427> and I shall set<WH5414> glory<WH6643> in the land<WH776> of the living;<WH2416>

I will make<WH5414> you a terror,<WH1091> and you shall be no<WH369> more: though you be sought<WH1245> for, yet shall you never<WH3808> <WH5769> be found<WH4672> again,<WH5750> said<WH5001> the Lord<WH136> GOD.<WH3069>
